name: USB4_XS_FUNC_ASYMMETRIC_DP_S2idle_TEST
steps: Step 1: Boot up USB4v2 supported platform like RPL-HX with USB4v2 root controller like Bobcat B0 card
Step 2: Connected USB4v2 device like Bullshark card, check asymmetric was not triggered, 80/80Gbps
Step 3: Connected one 8K monitor in graphic mode with Bullshark, asymmetric should be triggered, 120/40Gbps rx/tx speed
Step 4: Executed S2idle sleep: rtcwake -m freeze -s 30
Step 5: After wake up, DP tunnel should recover in order, for example 0:13 <-> 1:12 (DP) should not change, asymmetric 120/40Gbps rx/tx speed should be triggered also
summary: Boot up RPL-HX with cmdline thunderbolt.asym_threshold=20000, connected Bullshark AIC, connected 1*8K monitor and should trigger the asymmetric 120/40Gbps, then s2idle sleep, after wake up, check DP IN tunnel should not change and asymmetric should be triggered
